unnormalised: Arre yaar, pesticide usage is a big issue, no? Remember that Kerala flood a few years back? Experts blamed excessive pesticide use in plantations! Even for Onam sadhya, are we sure the ingredients are safe? My grandfather in Andhra always said natural farming is the best. Maybe ICRISAT can do more research. What do you guys think? Rs. 500 fine seems too less for violations. We need to protect our soil and people!
